## Loading the data


```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
candidates_data<-candidates %>%
  select(cand_id, cand_name, cand_party_affiliation, cand_office_state, cand_election_yr) %>%
  filter(cand_election_yr=="2012")
```

```{r}
contributions_data<-contributions %>%
  select(cand_id,name,transaction_amt)
```

```{r}
candidate_contribution_join <- candidates_data %>%
  full_join(contributions_data, by="cand_id")
```

```{r}
blehhh<-candidate_contribution_join %>%
  group_by(cand_office_state) %>%
  summarise(n=sum(abs(transaction_amt),na.rm=TRUE))
```
